MajorClaims.Text: traditional learning still has many benefits to the students

Claims.Text: the participant with the others like classmates or professors is still an important factor in studying
classroom learning provides other activities than studying
in school, there are professors that guided you during you had a problem or needed an advice

Premises.Text: Working in group leads to more discussion and more opinion among the class
the discussion class results in expanded children vision and their respect to others roommate's ideas
Unlike the distance learning that children have few opportunities to discuss with their friends
During student's free time, they have a number of activities that they can join, such as playing sports, going to lab, or going to library
These activities lead to more interact with their friends
Connection with friends improves their IQ abilities
they have a chance to learn about their societies
the online course keeps the children at their home only
The professor provides good answers to you
They do not mind helping you, and they never leave you alone when you got a problem
in distance learning, these aspects of the professor had reduced their important
The professor has been assigned to teach only
there will be a long response from the teachers when children ask them a question
